			1 = { province_event = { id = es_archeology.2 days = 365 } add_province_flag = "es_artifacts_amulet_of_infectious_charm" }

	id = es_archeology.2
	name = es_archeology.2.t
	desc = es_archeology.2.d
	picture = {

			OR = { area = morrowind_23_la
			area = morrowind_24_la }
		}
		picture = es_artifacts_amulet_of_infectious_charm_eventPicture
